Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: This is likely duplicate but need ~muralisr to verify and link to duplicate JIRA item

Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~ChristopherFerris The main work was started in https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/1057 and completed under https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-181, https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-182 and https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-183. There were other changes (especially in the area of security but that should cover it).
